feed.title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Tue Jul 02 2024 - Tue Jul 09 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of changes to BCD data
entry.content:
BCD Changes Report, Tue Jul 09 2024

Summary of BCD changes from Tuesday, 2 July 2024 to Tuesday, 9 July 2024

Added Features: 18

Expand to see the full list...

api

  1. api ➞ HTMLBaseElement ➞ href ➞ forbid_special_characters
  2. api ➞ IntersectionObserver ➞ delay
  3. api ➞ IntersectionObserver ➞ trackVisibility
  4. api ➞ IntersectionObserverEntry ➞ isVisible
  5. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ first-contentful-paint
  6. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ first-paint
  7. api ➞ VTTCue ➞ text ➞ all_html_character_references

css

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ flip-block
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ flip-inline
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ flip-start
  5. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ inset-area
  6. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ none

webextensions

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ contentScripts
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ contentScripts ➞ register ➞ world
  3. webextensions ➞ api ➞ declarativeNetRequest ➞ MAX_NUMBER_OF_DISABLED_STATIC_RULES
  4. webextensions ➞ api ➞ scripting ➞ executeScript ➞ world ➞ ISOLATED
  5. webextensions ➞ api ➞ scripting ➞ executeScript ➞ world ➞ MAIN

Removed Features: 37

Expand to see the full list...

css

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ -moz-orient ➞ auto
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ -moz-user-input ➞ disabled
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ -moz-user-input ➞ enabled
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ -webkit-mask-attachment
  5. css ➞ properties ➞ -webkit-overflow-scrolling
  6. css ➞ properties ➞ align-tracks
  7. css ➞ properties ➞ hanging-punctuation ➞ force-end
  8. css ➞ properties ➞ image-orientation ➞ flip_and_angle
  9. css ➞ properties ➞ initial-letter-align
  10. css ➞ properties ➞ justify-tracks
  11. css ➞ properties ➞ outline-color ➞ invert
  12. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-options
  13. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-options ➞ flip-block
  14. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-options ➞ flip-inline
  15. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-options ➞ flip-start
  16. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-options ➞ inset-area
  17. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-options ➞ none
  18. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-position ➞ inter-character
  19. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-3dlight-color
  20. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-arrow-color
  21. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-base-color
  22. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-darkshadow-color
  23. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-face-color
  24. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-highlight-color
  25. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-shadow-color
  26. css ➞ properties ➞ touch-action ➞ double-tap-zoom
  27. css ➞ selectors ➞ -moz-page
  28. css ➞ selectors ➞ -moz-page-sequence
  29. css ➞ selectors ➞ -moz-scrolled-page-sequence
  30. css ➞ selectors ➞ -webkit-details-marker

html

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ link ➞ methods
  2. html ➞ elements ➞ menu ➞ hr_separator
  3. html ➞ elements ➞ menu ➞ label
  4. html ➞ elements ➞ menu ➞ type_menu

svg

  1. svg ➞ elements ➞ feMorphology ➞ HTML_elements

webextensions

  1. webextensions ➞ manifest ➞ theme ➞ colors ➞ tab_background_separator
  2. webextensions ➞ manifest ➞ theme ➞ colors ➞ toolbar_field_separator

Implementation Status Changes: +5, -0

Added (5)

css

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ flip-block
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ flip-inline
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ flip-start
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ inset-area
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ none
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
